userStory.title: User Login Authentication
userStory.goal: log in to my account using email and password
userStory.benefit: I can access my personalized dashboard and saved preferences

acceptanceCriteria.precondition: the user is on the login page
acceptanceCriteria.action: the user enters valid credentials and clicks login
acceptanceCriteria.expectedResult: the user is redirected to their dashboard

acceptanceCriteria.precondition: the user is on the login page
acceptanceCriteria.expectedResult: an error message is displayed and the user remains on the login page

acceptanceCriteria.action: the user fails to login three times consecutively
acceptanceCriteria.expectedResult: the account is temporarily locked for 15 minutes
